overview: Big boys toys. There's nothing like the freedom of having your own motor, you can go where you want, when you want and take who you want with you. Whether that's down to the shops or out for a sneaky fuck. They can also be a huge attraction to potential sex partners, a hot set of wheels can certainly get you laid. Sex on Cars does what it says on the bonnet. The guys like their conquests risky, outdoors and over a warm ticking engine.
title: Sex on Cars
